description:
Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP: Personal Injury Attorneys Representing Clients With Dignity, Integrity And Intelligence

The aftermath of a catastrophic injury and resulting disability can usher in a period of financial and emotional uncertainty. At Marasco & Nesselbush, LLP, our personal injury attorneys work hard to ensure you and your family receive full and fair compensation to cover medical bills, lost wages, pain and suffering, and any other expenses and damages that may arise.

Since 1999, our firm has been providing individuals and families throughout Rhode Island with experienced, attentive and personalized representation in a wide variety of personal injury matters, including:

  • Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Catastrophic injuries
  • Medical malpractice
  • Product liability
  • Wrongful death
  • Slip and fall as well as other premises liability
  • Social Security Disability

Accidents can and do happen, but if the negligent actions of another individual caused the accident that resulted in your injuries, it's important to take action and secure the compensation you deserve. In many cases, injuries require extensive medical care and long-term treatments. If you are unable to work while you receive treatment, your family could be left with limited options for supporting themselves. As your lawyers, we will work tirelessly to see that you and your family are protected as we resolve your case efficiently and effectively.

Contact us at one of our five offices, including our Providence, Wakefield, Warwick and Woonsocket locations in Rhode Island. We also have offices in Massachusetts and Connecticut. We invite you to call, schedule your free initial consultation and learn how we can help you.
